title: GitHub
description: Raise issues, submit change propsals, and check on upcoming enhancments. Become part of the BrAPI developer community by checking out the GitHub project.

title: SwaggerHub
description: Browser the BrAPI specification on SwaggerHub.

title: Apiary
description: Don't like reading raw markdown files? Take a look at the human readable version of BrAPI, hosted by Apiary.

title: Wiki
description: From a history of BrAPI to development best practices, the BrAPI Wiki is the #1 repository for all BrAPI related documentation.

title: BrAPI R
description: The BrAPI R library has a complete BrAPI Client implementation written in R.

title: BrAPI X (R)
description: BrAPI X provides eXtra tools to the BrAPI R library for convenient bulk download breeding data and for creating quick summaries and quality checks.

title: BrAPI UI (R)
description: BrAPI UI integrates the visualization tools of RStudio with the BrAPI R library.

title: BrAPI.js
description: The BrAPI.js library has a complete BrAPI Client implementation written in JavaScript.

title: BrAPI + Drupal
description: This is a BrAPI client module written for the Drupal CMS. Check out a demo HERE

title: Java Client Library
description: For developers using Java, we also maintain a small library that provides an easier route for end-clients to utilize BrAPI.

title: BrAPPs
description: Explore, download, and integrate with the community library of BrAPI enabled Apps

title: BrAVA
description: The BrAPI Validation App is a BrAPI test client designed to run a set of validation tests on any BrAPI compliant server.

title: BrAPI Test Server
description: Check out our official, BrAPI cetrified test server. This server hosts a complete BrAPI implementation connected to a database full of sample data.

title: Publication
description: The official BrAPI publication. Share, cite, and enjoy!
